DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , 16-week study design evaluate hypothesis tissue-resident herpes virus may causally relate fibromyalgia symptom recurrence . IMC-1 combination treatment design suppress suspect virus thus alleviate fibromyalgia symptom .
DOC.brief_title: A Study IMC-1 In Patients With Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis fibromyalgia English speaker Rheumatologic diseases Bipolar disease , OCD , severe anxiety , schizophrenia Systemic infection , severe cardiac disease , chronic steroid usage chronic opioid usage
